edu.concordia.app.strategy

Class GreedyPlayerStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.concordia.app.strategy.PlayerStrategy
      • edu.concordia.app.strategy.GreedyPlayerStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class GreedyPlayerStrategy
extends PlayerStrategy
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class creates an instance for the Greedy player. Greedy player will make a move in such a way which will help him/her to get maximum number of Lantern cards. And again player will place a lake tile in such a way which will help for the next turn to make a dedication.
    Author:
    Team E
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • filterExcessLanternCards

        public static void filterExcessLanternCards(GameInstance gameObj,
                                            Players playing)
        This method will discard the excess Lantern cards, if the current player has more than 12 lantern cards. The player has two options, either to discard the lantern cards of his choice or to perform either of the three possible dedications.
        Parameters:
        gameObj - The GameInstance object for updating game elements according to user choice.
        playing - The current player of the game. .
